column5: From the Globe and Mail web site:  http://www.theglobeandmail.com/news/video/video-aurora-borealis-seen-from-space/article2236056/  Better yet check out BillM's link a couple of posts down.
Here's a link to the entire vid (In HD).  It's unreal!
Thanks for that, very cool. I had to show the kiddos that, they said "awesome!!!"  Very weird seeing all the lights from space too, and the storms/lightning as well
